item.title: Conquering Mount Rinjani
item.author: Christopher Richardson,,
item.description: To the unacquainted, volcano climbing in the Indonesian archipelago might seem a little dumb, but in reality there’s only so much tanning and partying you can handle before you get the itch to do something a little more challenging. Having done my homework, I’d come to the conclusion that Mount …
